mapper.insert: insert into menu (id, text, url, parent_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update menu set parent_id = null where parent_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select m1.id, m1.text, m1.url, m2.id as m_id, m2.text as m_text, m2.url as m_url from menu as m1 left join menu as m2 on m1.parent_id = m2.id order by m1.id desc
select parent_id from menu where id = #{id}
